title: Poster, 1985
medium: Offset lithograph on white wove paper
inscribed:
Imprinted in red lower left below image on white: TONY SHAFRAZI / PAINTINGS 163 MERCER STREET 212925 8732 OCTOBER 26 - NOVEMBER 30. 
Imprinted in red block letters below image in white border: LEO CASTELLI / SCULPTURES 142 GREENE STREET 212 431 6279 OCTOBER 26 - NOVEMBER 22
Imprinted in black lower right along right edge: H H A design
Imprinted in black lower left along left edge: photo: Ivan Della Tana
Verso: upper left quadrant: mailing label addressed to Dan Friedman/ 2 Fifth Avenue 15U / New York, NY 10011.
First class postage from long Island City dated October 22, 1985
provenance: From the collection of Dan Friedman
description: Color photograph of the artist in a sculpture fabrication studio. Haring, wearing blue jeans and a red -shirt with crawling baby logo, leans against a large, steel sculpture of a dancing dog. In red block letters below image on white border, KEITH HARING.

tombstone.epitaph:
Poster, 1985.
1985. Offset lithograph on white wove paper. Gift of Ken Friedman. 1997-19-261.
